content.description: Stand start on the left side of the east face utilizing a right crimp, a left hand palm, and a quarter-size jib. Smear the left foot to gain the left hand rail, hand-foot match on the right side and push up to gain a positive hold hear the top.
content.location: The climb starts on the left side of the east face. Reference picture for exact location. There is a down "slide" off the west side of the boulder.

climbs.name: Smelling Like Poop is Better than Being Shot

content.description: Sit start on the right side of the south face and move to the apex of the boulder.
content.protection: Pads and a spotter but the landing is great.
content.location: This problem starts on the right side of the south face. The down climb is on the west side of the boulder. Reference pictures for more details.

content.description: Stand start on a positive rail (the same rail as Campus Slab). Move up and left using incredibly small feet and positive hands.
content.location:
This starts on the same rail as Campus Slab but moves up and left, avoiding the rails and positive holds on the right side.

There is a down climb on the west side of the boulder.

content.description: Stand start on the right-center of the northeast slab. Move up and right, utilizing the large rail near the top for your feet.
content.location: This is on the right-center of the northeast slab. There is a down climb on the west side of the boulder.

content.description: Sit start on the left side of the south face of the Clandestine Block. Move up and over on the lip to the apex and top out.
content.protection: Pads and a spotter but the landing is great.
content.location: There is a down climb on the west side of the boulder. Reference picture for exact route location.

content.description: Stand start in the center of the south face utilizing a small rail and smaller feet. Make a big, but tech-y move to the lip and top out. It's a one move wonder but it's a fun move.
content.protection: Pads and a spotter but the landing is great.
content.location: The route starts in the center of the south face. There is a down climb on the west side of the boulder. Reference picture for exact details.
